title: '52 Panhead
description: Jeff's a decent guy from the wrong side of the tracks. Badly hurt by a failed relationship, he's wary of commitment. Evan lost his first love ten years ago and still isn't quite over it. After a chance meeting, they realize that this could be more than they ever hoped for, if they can find the courage to trust and believe.Status: In progress/IncompleteLast update: 09/28/2010
author: Gabriel Morgan
